Package com.goldasil.pjv.models

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.goldasil.pjv.models.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
PersonPlayer, RandomPlayer
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Represends a general player in a card gameControllers. The class contains a basic pack of functions necessary for handling cards a player has in the hand.
